mysql-orm: utils.js

'use strict'; /* * MySQL object-relational mapping * =============================== * * (C) 2014 Mark K Cowan <mark@battlesnake.co.uk> * * https://github.com/battlesnake/node-mysql-orm * * Released under GNU General Public License, Version 2 * */ var mysql = require('mysql'); var async = require('async'); var _ = require('underscore');

util

Internally-used utilities

indent

Indents a multiline string

module.exports.indent = function (str) { return '\t' + str.replace(/\n/g, '\n\t'); };

names

Get a list of object names within the given object. Returns all field names
that don't begin with $.

module.exports.names = function (obj) { return _(obj).keys().filter( function (key) { return key.charAt(0) !== ' ; }); };

args

Arguments parser for:

function ([query, ] table, [criteria, [options, ]] callback)

module.exports.parse_args = function (orm, args) { var _table; var params = { query: function () { return (_(args[0]).isFunction() && args[0].name === 'query') ? args.shift() : orm.query; }, table: function () { var table = args.shift(); if (_(table).isString()) { return _table = orm.schema[table]; } else if (_(table).isObject() && _(table).$type === 'table') { return _table = orm.schema[table.$name]; } else { return null; } }, data: function () { if (_(args[0]).isFunction()) { return {}; } var data = args.shift(); if (_(data).isNull() || _(data).isUndefined()) { data = {}; } if (_(data).isString() || _(data).isNumber()) { if (table.$primary.length !== 1) { return callback(new Error('Table "' + _table.$name + '" ' + 'has no simple primary key, please specify a search ' + 'key explicitly')); } data = _.object([table.$primary[0]], [data]); } }, options: function () { return args.shift() || {}; }, callback: function () { return args.pop(); } }; return { query: params.query(), table: params.table(), callback: params.callback(), data: params.data(), options: params.options() }; };
